home.categories-title: Choose your favorite category and discover the perfect experience for you

payment.processing: Please wait a moment. We're processing your payment.
payment.loading: Please wait a moment. We're loading payment information.

no.booking: This user has no bookings to process at the moment.

error.duplicated: We already have a pending payment registered for this booking. We'll send you an email soon.

payment.required-info: The following information is needed to confirm your booking.

after-booking.title: What happens after making a booking?
after-booking.email-info: You'll receive an email confirming your booking and providing details of the experience. If you wish, you can also see the details by logging in to your account.
after-booking.provider-notification: The provider will be notified about the booking.
after-booking.provider-contact-info: You can contact the provider regarding any doubts you may have.

payment.disclaimer: The Government of the City of Buenos Aires does not intervene in transactions between users and providers, except for those activities organized by BA Tourism.

number.label: Card number
number.tooltip: Please enter your complete card number with no spaces.

issuer.label: Card issuer
issuer.tooltip: Please select your card issuer. If your issuer is not listed, select 'other'.

name.label: Name of cardholder
name.placeholder: Please enter the cardholder's full name
name.tooltip: Please enter the cardholder's full name as printed on the card.

card-security-code.label: Security code
card-security-code.tooltip: Please enter your card's security code, which you'll find in the signature space on the back of the card.

document-type.label: Type of document
document-type.tooltip: Please select the type of document. If you are not a resident of Argentina, you should select 'other'.

document-number.label: Document number
document-number.placeholder: Please enter the number of your document
document-number.tooltip: Please enter the number of your document without spaces or dashes.

payment.terms-and-conditions-1: I have read, understood and accept the

details.question: Question
details.enter-email-question: Write down your activity consultation below
details.question-message: The Inquiry was sent to the provider

qualified.existent: There is already a review for this reservation.

time.expired: After the 45 days of the activity date we do not allow the qualification.

thanks.title: Thank you very much, for your opinion.

review.message: Wait a few moments please, we are processing your opinion
review.title: Leave your opinion on the experience

super-flexible.title: Super Flexible
super-flexible.description: A full refund minus any relevant administration costs will be available up until 3 hours before the reserved activity.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: A full refund minus any relevant administration costs will be available up until the day before the reserved activity.

moderated.title: Moderated
moderated.description: A full refund minus any relevant administration costs will be available up until 3 days before the reserved activity.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: A full refund minus any relevant administration costs will be available up until 7 days before the reserved activity.

super-strict.title: Very Strict
super-strict.description: A full refund minus any relevant administration costs will be available up until 15 days before the reserved activity.

disclaimer.title: Important
disclaimer.description: For cancelation purposes, the number of days is counted back from 10:00am on the day of the reserved activity. Once the cancelation period has passed, a refund cannot be issued.

instant.title: Immediate confirmation
instant.description: The booking is automatically confirmed. It requires no response from the provider.

manual.title: Manual confirmation
manual.description: The booking must be accepted by the provider before it can be confirmed.

minimum-quota.title: Confirmation with a minimum number of participants
minimum-quota.description: The reservation is confirmed automatically when the minimum number of participants established by the provider has been met. Until there are enough bookings, confirmation remains pending.

disclaimer.title: Important
disclaimer.description: The first requirement for booking activities that have a cost is payment authorisation. In cases where the booking is not confirmed by the time of the activity, or is rejected by the provider, payment will be refunded in full, minus any administration charges incurred.

error.not-equals: The two passwords entered are not the same.
error.length: Your password must contain at least 6 characters.

booking.loading: Wait a moment please, we're loading your booking information...
booking.canceling: Wait a moment please, we're canceling your booking...

rejected.title: Sorry. The booking has been rejected.
rejected.next-minutes: Your booking has been rejected. You can book another activity, or try again later. Thank you.

confirm.messaje: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?

pending.title: Thank you. Your booking is awaiting confirmation.
pending.next-minutes: Your booking has not yet been confirmed. You'll get an email with more information soon.

error.nonexistent-code: There's no booking with that code.

limit.datetime: The booking cannot be confirmed at the moment because the time limit has passed. Please try booking for an alternative date.

payment.rejected: Payment has been rejected. Please try another method of payment.

not.exist: There is No reservation with that code.

not.adults: The reservation must have at least one adult

cancel.title-select: Do You Want To complete or partial cancel?
cancel.title: Select the number of passengers that will attend the reservation!

success.cancel: The booking has been canceled successfully.

thanks.title: Thank you, your booking is being processed
thanks.next-minutes: You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

payment.title: Payment
payment.mercado-pago: The MercadoPago payment number is:: __paymentExternalId__. This purchase will appear on your card statement as MercadoPago.
payment.disclaimer: Your card details will only be used for this transaction.

changes.title: Date changes and cancelations
changes.body: Please remember that to change the date or cancel a booking, you need to contact the provider directly.

profile.title: User profile
profile.required-info: The following information is needed to confirm your bookings.
profile.error: An error occurred when saving your profile. Please try again.
profile.success: Your profile has been saved successfully.

listing.activities-label_plural: We have __count__ activities for you

500: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again.
324: ID number is invalid for the selected ID type.
3028: The type of card chosen is invalid.
325: The month of expiry entered is incorrect.
326: The year of expiry entered is incorrect.
cc_rejected_insufficient_amount: The card used has insufficient funds to make payment.
cc_rejected_bad_filled_card_number: Please check the card number. It seems to be incorrect.
cc_rejected_bad_filled_date: Please check your card's expiry date.
cc_rejected_bad_filled_other: Please check the details entered because there appears to be a mistake.
cc_rejected_bad_filled_security_code: The security code entered is incorrect.
cc_rejected_blacklist: The card is not authorized to process the payment.
cc_rejected_call_for_authorize: Please authorize through your card issuer the payment to MercadoPago for the amount indicated.
cc_rejected_card_disabled: The card is not activated. Please contact the card issuer to activate it. The telephone number should be on the back of the card.
cc_rejected_duplicated_payment: You already made a payment for this amount. If you need to pay again, please use another card or other method of payment.
cc_rejected_max_attempts: You've made the maximum number of attempts allowed. Please choose another card to make payment.
cc_rejected_other_reason: Your card issuer did not process the payment.
